reviewText: Very poor audio and video, scratched dvds. I purchased three box sets in this "POP FLIX" series and none it really worth it.
Grandpa  and Grandma loved this bit of nostalgia. With Bogie, Marx how could you go wrong?  Its a brilliant collection and the quality is indeed acceptable
Heavy duty sleepers. Item arrived in excellent condition and very quickly. Yes, a great item for my library.

Usaully in some of these bargain dvds the video transfer is shoddy, but with this package its GREAT!
I did enjoy all of these movies, but the ones i liked best were "The Amazing Mr. X" and "The Man With The Golden Arm"
6 great film noir movies for 7 bucks is a great deal!
